name: Philosophies of Contention
desc:
Talent Level-Up material.

Contention is the principle by which all is weighed in the Nation of Pyro.

Its purpose is to make yourself stronger. After the outcome of a competition has been decided, the victor gains the confidence to be sure of their direction, while the loser gains insights on how they must become stronger. Beyond winning or losing, this is the true meaning of contention.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Guide to Contention
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.

Contention is the principle by which all is weighed in the Nation of Pyro.

Though humans cannot fly at the speed of winged beasts, nor match the flexibility of slimes, yet still, they have their own unique strengths. Sometimes, understanding both why and how to compete is the key to knowing oneself.

customize.name: Mavuika
customize.desc: The leader of Natlan who inherited the Ancient Name of "Kiongozi." She made a vow to illuminate the future of the nation of war with the Sacred Flame.

customize.name: Traveler (Pyro)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.name: Mualani
customize.desc: A well-known guide in Natlan who owns a watersports shop, and expert in all forms of wave-chasing.

customize.name: Iansan
customize.desc: Head coach of the fitness club at the Collective of Plenty, and a renowned Natlanese nutritionist.

customize.name: Teachings of Contention
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.

Contention is the principle by which all is weighed in the Nation of Pyro.

What defines strength, and what weakness? Only victory and defeat. The results of a contest are more convincing than any words.
